title: This War of Mine v1.3.8 [Mod+No Mod]
description:
The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle.


10/10-Steam
4.5/5-Google Play
4.5/5-iTunes - Apple

This War of Mine is a 2014 war survival video game developed by 11 bit studios. The game, which was inspired by the 1992â€“96 Siege of Sarajevo during the Bosnian War, differs from most war-themed video ... Wikipedia
Initial release date: November 14, 2014
Developer: 11 bit studios
Genres: Action-adventure game
Platforms: Android, iOS, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Microsoft Windows, Linux, Mac OS
Publishers: 11 bit studios, Deep Silver
Nominations: The Game Award for Games For Change



What is the Mod:

- Unlocked

What is in this version :

* Critical bugfix: Game freeze / crash after day 42 and 45.
* Bugfix: Old Town location freezes.
* Bugfix: Freezes after picking up items.
* Bugfix: 5 survivors in a shelter issue
